name: Food Crimes: Bread Edition
description:
A great mystery to solve. Food Crimes is a third person puzzle game of detectives. In Food Crimes you will feel the true spirit of the detective.      

Complete all the puzzles, mysteries and solve the crime of the mansion. Finding out who the killer is is our goal in this adventure.

Food Crimes is a puzzle game. We know that in Staem there are millions of games with this mechanics, but we will not join them. The game is not made of puzzles but the puzzles build the game. It is based on the famous Cluedo board game as the main idea and is also inspired by Professor Layton's saga. It presents a very simple but immersive mecancias, you will have to explore all the rooms of the mansion and discover who is the killer of Lady Baguette. For them you will have to solve all the enigmas and cases. The game has a very marked game line so it is very difficult that at some point you feel lost. The immersive force that narrative and gameplay presents is undoubted, putting you in the shoes of a frustrated detective who will finally be able to demonstrate his full potential. If you like mystery games, detectives and puzzles, this is your game
